channel.title: ~linux lovers look~
channel.description:
Okay I'm gonna need some help putting my p server on my dedicated Linux server
ill get u the details on the servers soon there should be 2 they are currently running on Novell ugh but i want to transfer them to Linux and make them my dedicated host anyone who can help get to be admin on my server =) thanks for your help...
anyone know Linux good? i know a little..... but not enough to run it...[br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2007, 10:55:47 PM[/size][hr]omg i need some help!
